title: Adani Energy Solutions valued at $18.5 billion; revenue to grow 20%
description: Adani Energy Solutions Ltd, valued at USD 18.5 billion, is expected to see significant growth in the next three years. The company has a diversified portfolio including transmission, distribution, and smart metering businesses. It aims to capitalize on India's increasing energy demand and recent capital raise to drive growth across its segments.
